EmailTemplate.name: 201803_EMEAI_GDPR_EmailOpt-in_mih.201805_EMEAI_GDPR_Opt-inEmail4_mih.Subject Lin
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Stay Informed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}},
At Honeywell Aerospace, we are constantly innovating from high performance inflight connectivity, to powerful, reliable engines. If you’d like to know about out latest technologies, you’ve got to stay in the loop.
This is your last opportunity to accept this invitation. Why not make it easy on yourself and click the button below? If you do not click, we will no longer email you.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We’ll continue to keep your information private and secure. We appreciate your trust in the Honeywell brand.
Sincerely,
Adam O'Neill Director of Communications Europe, Middle East, Africa & India Honeywell Aerospace
